entries: {@i Recovery Up+.} Je krijgt het maximum aantal hit points terug dat je kunt krijgen van potions of {@table plants|AGMH} die je consumeert.

items.name: Shara Ishvalda Tenderclaw
entries: While you are wearing this armor, you can use an action to speak its command word to cast the {@spell stoneskin} spell, but only target yourself. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until the next dawn.

items.name: Shara Ishvalda Tenderplate
entries: {@i Defense Boost (Lightning).} While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC, you are immune to lightning damage.

items.name: Shara Ishvalda Gem
entries: {@i Shara Divinity.} For each shara ishvalda material you have in your armor, trinkets, and weapons that you are attuned to, including this material, you gain the following armor properties from the list below:

items.name: Shara Ishvalda Tenderscale
entries: {@i Partbreaker+3.} Je brengt een extra 1d10 schade toe wanneer je kritisch raakt met dit wapen.

items.name: Shara Ishvalda Boulderplate
entries: {@i Critical Boost+.} You can roll two additional weapon damage dice when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a weapon attack.

items.name: Shara Ishvalda Petalstone
entries: While you are attuned to this weapon you can use an action and point your finger at a target to cast the {@spell finger of death} spell, but the spell deals thunder damage instead of force. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until the next dawn.

items.name: Shara Ishvalda Tenderclaw
entries: {@i Coalescence.} Whenever you succeed on a saving throw to end a condition, you gain a +1 bonus to your attack rolls and spell save DC, and your weapon or spell attacks deal an extra 1d4 cold, fire, or lightning damage (your choice) until the end of your next turn.

items.name: Shara Ishvalda Tenderplate
entries: Your weapon deals an extra 2d6 thunder damage.

items.name: Shara Ishvalda Gem
entries: {@i (spellcaster only)} This weapon has 10 runes. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its runes to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell thunderwave} (1 rune), {@spell shatter} (2 runes), {@spell meld into stone} (3 runes), {@spell thunder step|XGE} (3 runes), {@spell stone shape} (4 runes).
Het wapen krijgt dagelijks bij dageraad 1d6 + 4 verbruikte runen terug. Als je de laatste rune hebt verbruikt, gooi dan een d20. Bij een 1 kan het wapen 1 week lang geen runen herwinnen.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: Elke zeldzaamheid wapen upgrade materiaal.

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: Elke zeldzaamheid armor upgrade materiaal.

resist.note: from magical weapons while lao-shun skull is not broken

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The shen gaoren can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the shen gaoren fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The shen gaoren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The shen gaoren deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Lao Shun Skull
entries: The shen gaoren protects its vulnerable back with the skull of a Lao Shun (AC 20, 200 HP; immunity to poison and psychic damage, resistances to piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons, vulnerable to bludgeoning damage). Damaging the shell deals no damage to the shen gaoren. Once destroyed, the Shen Gaoren takes -2 to AC and becomes vulnerable to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from magical weapons.

trait.name: Armored Legs
entries: The shen gaoren has 4 legs stretching 30 feet up. Each leg can be attacked (AC 16; 25 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage, resistances to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons). Damaging a leg deals no damage to the shen gaoren. Reducing all four legs to 0 hit points causes the shen gaoren to immediately use its reaction to {@i collapse}. 3 rounds after the shen gaoren uses {@i collapse}, its legs heal to their maximum hp and the shen gaoren can stand up.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shen gaoren can use its Summon Hermitaurs. It then makes six attacks. four with its legs and two with its claw attack. It can replace any of these attacks with its acid spit, so long as the lao shun shell is not destroyed.

action.name: Summon Hermitaurs
entries: The shen gaoren summons 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hermitaurs from underground within 120 feet of the shen gaoren.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}) . Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The shen gaoren can grapple up to 2 targets, one with each claw.

action.name: Legs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft. while standing or 5 ft. while {@condition prone}, one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Acid Spit (usable only when standing)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) acid damage. If the creature is in either metal armor or has a metal shield being worn or carried, its takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the creature has a nonmagical weapon made of metal, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed.

action.name: Collapse
entries: The shen gaoren falls {@condition prone} for 3 rounds crushing any creature under or around it. While {@condition prone} in this way, the shen gaoren may still move up to half its movement speed and creatures do not gain advantage on melee weapon attack against the shen gaoren. Any creatures under or within 5 feet of the shen gaoren must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the shen gaoren's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the shen gaoren's space.

action.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 5-6, only usable while prone and Lao Shun Skull is not destroyed)
entries: The shen gaoren releases a high pressure stream of poison from its shell and turns 360 degrees around. Each creature, on the ground, in a 30-foot radius of shen gaoren must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 99 ({@damage 18d10}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The shen gaoren moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The shen gaoren makes one Claw or Leg attack.

legendary.name: Shake Off (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The shen gaoren thrashes around in an attempt to throw any object or creature that is on its body. Each creature on the shen gaoren must make a {@dc 20} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (creature's choice), or be thrown off the shen gaoren taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fall damage upon hitting the ground. A creature that fails its save by 5 or more, also falls {@condition prone}.

Identifiable by their grey skin, towering legs and the gigantic green-yellow balls of acid that they generate and hurl from the rear of their bodies. Shen Gaoren are so large they use a {@creature Lao-Shan Lung|MHMM} skull for protection. Their colossal size helps them to defeat most creatures. The diet of Shen Gaoren is unknown; however, it is likely to be omnivorous, like most real-life crabs.

Its massive pincers are increbibly strong and sturdy, being described as capable of cutting through even the toughest volcanic rock. Its long legs give the Shen Gaoren an incredible field-of-vision, and if its eyesight is proficient, it should be able to spot prey from a very large distance. Like many other Carapaceons, its rear section is naturally very soft, and, if left unprotected, it's a large weak point. Fortunately, for them, Shen Gaoren are able to acquire the equally gigantic skull shells of the mighty Lao-Shan Lung, whether they are actually able to kill the massive dragon is still uncertain, but unprobable, which serves as incredibly efficient armor. It has been recently found that the gigantic skull shows signs of containing the deadly dragon element but Shen Gaoren doesn't seem to use the this element. The Shen Gaoren is grey/blue in color, but its legs turn red as they experience great pain.

One of Shen Gaoren's deadliest abilities is its ability to shoot a gigantic ball of acid from its gigantic skull. This acidic ball can corrode armor rather quickly and, in some cases, it can even melt straight through the armor. Its unknown how this monster is able to produce this acid or even fire it out of its skull.

Due to Shen Gaoren not being seen interacting with other species, it is unknown how it fits into the ecological niche. Shen Gaorens are relatively passive by nature. They move about without noticing hunters; however, when enraged, it may attempt to attack hunters by using their huge sturdy claws or by moving their legs and pincers wildly. It was recently discovered that Shen Gaoren attack villages and cities because they are in its territory. Shen Gaoren were found to attack any foe that pose any threat to them, showing that these passive giants can be aggressive when they feel that their life is in danger. When Shen Gaoren get old enough, or injured in battle, they'll molt.

items.name: Gaoren Shell
entries: {@i Tremor-Proof.} U kunt niet worden gestoten {@condition prone} terwijl u dit pantser draagt.

items.name: Gaoren Pincer
entries: {@i (Lance & Greatsword only)} Your Guard AC bonus now lasts until the start of your next turn and you cannot be knocked {@condition prone}.

items.name: Gaoren Carapace
entries: {@i Guts+2.} When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

items.name: Gaoren Spine
entries: You have immunity to cold damage and resistance to thunder and lightning damage while you wear this armor.

items.name: Gaoren Shell
entries: Your weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d8} acid damage.

items.name: Gaoren Pincer
entries: Whenever you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack with this weapon, you can restrain the creature instead of dealing damage. You can only have one creature {@condition restrained} in this way at a time.

items.name: Gaoren Claw
entries: While attuned to this weapon, as an action you can exhale acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 8d6} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Eenmaal gebruikt, kan deze eigenschap niet opnieuw gebruikt worden tot je een lange rustperiode beëindigt.

items.name: Gaoren Carapace
entries: The first time you attack with this weapon on each of your turns, you can transfer some or all of the weapon's bonus to your Armor Class, instead of using the bonus on any attacks that turn. The adjusted bonuses remain in effect until the start of your next turn, although you must hold the weapon to gain a bonus to AC from it.

items.name: Gaoren Spine
entries: This weapon stores spells cast into it, holding them until the wielder uses them. You must be attuned to this weapon to use it. The weapon can store up to 7 levels worth of spells at a time. Any creature can cast a spell of 1st through 7th level into the weapon by touching it as the spell is cast. The spell has no effect, other than to be stored in the weapon. If the weapon can't hold the spell, the spell is expended without effect. The level of the slot used to cast the spell determines how much space it uses.

While holding this weapon, you can cast any spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and spellcasting ability modifier of the original caster, but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the weapon is no longer stored in it, freeing up space.

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: Elke zeldzaamheid armor upgrade materiaal.
{@i Players can also carve from the Lao-Shan Skull if it is destroyed during the fight using the loot table below.}

items.name: Lao-Shan Scale
entries: {@i Marathon Runner+.} Terwijl je dit pantser draagt, verhoogt je loopsnelheid met 10 voet en negeer je moeilijk begaanbaar terrein als het niet door een magisch effect werd gecreëerd.

items.name: Lao-Shan Shell
entries: {@i Evasion+.} Je krijgt een +1 bonus op alle saving throws en je hebt voordeel op Dexterity saving throws terwijl je dit pantser draagt.

items.name: Lao-Shan Horn
entries: Terwijl je dit harnas draagt, wordt elke kritische slag tegen je een normale slag.

items.name: Lao-Shan Scale
entries: Your weapon deals an extra 2d6 bludgeoning damage and it deals double damage to objects and structures.

items.name: Lao-Shan Shell
entries: {@i Quick Sheath.} Als je op dit wapen bent afgestemd, kun je het altijd als vrije actie wegleggen, zelfs als je al een wapen hebt getrokken als onderdeel van je bewegingsactie.

items.name: Lao-Shan Horn
entries: {@i Steady Hand.} Het bereik van de critical hit van je wapenaanval wordt met 1 verhoogd en het omzeilt de weerstand van een wezen tegen hakschade.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: De ceanataur kan lucht en water inademen.

trait.name: Scuttle
entries: As a bonus action, the shogun ceanataur can moves up to its speed in a straight line.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shogun ceanataur makes two claw attacks. It can use poison spit in place of any melee attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or lose 3 ({@dice 1d6}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an bloody wound. Each time the shogun ceanataur hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 3 ({@dice 1d6}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Poison Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 7d4}) poison damage. On a hit, the target must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Hydropump {@recharge 5}
entries: The shogun ceanataur releases a high pressure stream of water from the back of its shell in an 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage and not on a successful one.

legendary.name: Dig
entries: The shogun ceanataur burrows underground and moves up to half its burrow speed.

legendary.name: Spit
entries: The shogun ceanataur makes a poison spit attack.

legendary.name: Sweeping Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The shogun ceanataur sweeps its claws in a 10 ft. line that is 35 ft. wide. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) slashing damage and increases the damage from a bloody wound by 3 ({@dice 1d6}) on a failed save. On a successful one, the target takes half damage and does not increase the bloody wounds damage.

Shogun Ceanataur is a Carapaceon. However, they hardly resemble their cousins, the Daimyo Hermitaur. Shogun Ceanataur's body is covered in a blue carapace. Its head is long and knife-shaped, and features a pair of lengthy antennae. Its folding claws act as sickles, that fully extended, adding a significant amount of range to its reach. Shogun Ceanataur is known to inhabit a variety of shells, among them: A {@creature Gravios|MHMM} skull, a snail-like shell, and a skull belonging to an unknown wyvern.

Compared to {@creature Daimyo Hermitaur|MHMM}, Shogun Ceanataur has a much slimmer shape. From the lighter shell of Shogun Ceanataur, it is able to move faster than Daimyo Hermitaur. With this lighter armor, Shogun Ceanataur are also able to attack and move offensively rather than defensively. Another bizarre defense of Shogun Ceanataur is its own urine. While wearing a skull and hanging on a ceiling, Shogun Ceanataur are known to spray water on their enemies from the ceiling.

Each Shogun Ceanataur has their own personality. Some are more aggressive than others. When undisturbed, Shogun Ceanataur are usually fairly calm, however, if threatened, they will turn aggressive in an instant. They'll unsheath their claws and will attempt to kill a foe. If the skull on Shogun Ceanataur's backside is broken, it'll immediately go looking for another one, so it can protect its vulnerable bottom.

Shogun Ceanataur are somewhat high in the food chain. They primarily feed on small creatures that live in dark environments like shrimp and insects, but will also feed on carrion. Despite this, they can more than hold their own against larger species. They are also known to have battles with {@creature Khezu|MHMM} and other Shogun Ceanataur in the caves of the swamp.

items.name: Ceanataur Shell
entries: {@i Handicraft.} Gedurende 24 uur krijg je elke dageraad vaardigheid met een ambachtelijk stuk gereedschap naar keuze.

items.name: Ceanataur Leg
entries: Je hebt weerstand tegen koude schade terwijl je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: Ceanataur Claw
entries: {@i (Greatsword only)} While attuned to this armor, your Guard AC bonus now lasts until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Ceanataur Shell
entries: {@i Ammo Saver.} When you roll a 17-20 on a range attack roll die, the ammunition returns to you unbroken after hitting the target(s).

items.name: Ceanataur Leg
entries: {@i Critical Eye.} Het bereik van de critical hit van je wapenaanvallen wordt met 1 verhoogd.

items.name: Ceanataur Claw
entries: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with this weapon, you can wound the target. At the start of each of the wounded creature's turns, it takes {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage for each time you've wounded it, and it can then make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, ending the effect of all such wounds on itself on a success. Alternatively, the wounded creature, or a creature within 5 feet of it, can use an action to make a {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check, ending the effect of such wounds on it on a success.

items.name: Crab Pearl
entries: Een juweel gevormd in het lichaam gedurende vele jaren gewaardeerd op 75 gp.

items.name: Monster Toughbone
entries: Zeer zeldzaam wapen upgrade materiaal.

items.name: Black Pearl
entries: A pearl with a black glow valued at 250 gp.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: De legiana lokt geen gelegenheidsaanval uit als hij buiten het bereik van een vijand vliegt.

trait.name: Frost
entries: A creature that starts its turn or moves into an area covered in frost must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become diseased with {@condition iceblight|MHMM} for 1 minute.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the legiana fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The legiana makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its talons, and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage and leaves a layer of frost in an area that is 10 feet long and 15 feet wide centered on the target or 30 feet long and 5 feet wide in front of the legiana until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (Escape {@dc 20}).

action.name: Corkscrew {@recharge 5}
entries: The legiana moves up to half of its fly speed in a straight line, covering the ground below it in frost for 1 minute. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creature's spaces. The first time the legiana enters a creature's space, the creature must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw.
On a failed save, the creature takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and can choose to be pushed 5 feet to the side of the legiana. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

legendary.name: Wing Buffet
entries: The legiana flaps its wings creating a strong wind, and frost on the ground, in a 60 foot line that is 10 feet wide in front of it. Each creature in this line must make a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 15 feet.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The legiana makes one talon attack.

legendary.name: Frost Armor (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The legiana coats itself in a layer of frost and ice for 1 minute, until it takes 30 fire damage from a spell or until takes 40 damage from any other single attack.
While coated in this way, the legiana has +2 bonus to its AC and its attacks that would leave a layer of frost instead deal 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage to a creature in the area the frost would be.

Shrieking legiana are structurally the same as their {@creature legiana|MHMM|regular counterparts}, but have black coloration instead of blue and their chest, tail, and wing patterns are encrusted with spiky ice.

Shrieking legiana's manipulation of ice improved further as a result of adapting to the Hoarfrost Reach. For defensive purposes, it has the ability to coat itself in a layer of ice while remaining as agile as its coral highlands cousin. Offensively, It specializes in freezing prey with the powerful chill it emits, swooping down to strike them from overhead and many of their attacks cover large areas with ice spikes or frost.
As with their cousins, the shrieking legiana are intensely territorial and will attack whatever ventures into their territory.

items.name: Rime Hide
entries: {@i Free Meal.} Als je op dit harnas bent afgestemd, hoef je niet meer te eten of te drinken.

items.name: Legiana Shard
entries: {@i Marathon Runner+.} Terwijl je dit pantser draagt, verhoogt je loopsnelheid met 10 voet en negeer je moeilijk begaanbaar terrein als het niet door een magisch effect werd gecreëerd.

items.name: Stark Wing
entries: While flying you can take the {@action dodge} action as a bonus action. You can use this property a number of times equal to your constitution modifier, regaining all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

items.name: L.Cryo Sac
entries: Je bent immuun voor koude schade als je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: Legiana Tail Webbing
entries: {@i Evade Extender (M).} Je krijgt een +2 bonus op Dexterity saving throws terwijl je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: S.Legiana Gem
entries: {@i Good Luck.} Terwijl je op dit pantser bent afgestemd, heb je één gelukspunt dat je dagelijks bij dageraad terugkrijgt. Je mag dit punt gebruiken alsof je de gelukseigenschap hebt.

items.name: Rime Hide
entries: {@i FastCharge+.} Als je je initiatiefrol doet, krijgt je zwaard, langzwaard, charge blade of tonfas 2 lading, spirit of phial lading.

items.name: Legiana Shard
entries: {@i (Bow Only)} Your dragonpiercer can be used one extra time per long rest and deals an extra 2d6 piercing damage.

items.name: Obsidian Icetalon
entries: {@i Critical Draw+.} Tijdens de eerste gevechtsronde scoren je mêlee wapenaanvallen een kritieke treffer bij een worp van 15 of hoger.

items.name: Stark Wing
entries: Your weapon deals an extra {@damage 2d4} cold damage.

items.name: L.Cryo Sac
entries: You gain a + 2 bonus to your spell attack rolls and spell save DC while attuned to this weapon. This bonus increases to +3 when the spell you are casting deals cold damage, such as the {@spell ice knife|XGE} or {@spell snilloc's snowball swarm|XGE} spell.

items.name: Legiana Tail Webbing
entries: Je wapen brengt een extra 1d8 koude schade toe.

items.name: S.Legiana Gem
entries: While attuned to this weapon, you can use an action to speak its command word causing ice to coat the weapon for 1 minute or up to 10 pieces of ammunition. A creature hit by the coated weapon or ammunition takes 1d6 extra damage and has its movement speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn. Once used, this property can't be used again until you finish a long rest.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or Darkness, the silverwind nargacuga can take the {@action Hide} action as a Bonus Action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +18.

trait.name: Razor Wind
entries: When the silverwind nargacuga's makes an attack with its tail swipe, or tail slam it releases a 60 foot long by 5 foot wide line of razor sharp wind. This wind originates from the target creatures position. Any creature in that line, must make {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an bloody wound. The damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) each time a creature is hit by the razor wind and fails the Constitution saving throw. Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The silverwind nargacuga makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its bladed wings, and one with its tail swipe. Or it makes two tail spike attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} om te raken, reikwijdte 5 ft., één doel. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) doorborende schade.

action.name: Bladed Wings
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Swipe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tail Spikes
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 60/150 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@dice 3d12 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Feral Pounce {@recharge 5}
entries: The silverwind nargacuga leaps towards its target, jumping 10 feet, as part of its movement, and attacks with both its claws. The target must make on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save the target takes takes 66 ({@damage 12d10}) piercing damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}. Additionally, if the target is {@condition prone} or knocked {@condition prone}, the silverwind nargacuga can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Tail Slam
entries: The silverwind nargacuga extends its tail to its maximum length (40 feet long by 5 feet wide) and slams it onto the ground. Each creature in that line is considered the originator for a razor wind, and they must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful save.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The silverwind nargacuga makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) Check.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The silverwind nargacuga makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Tail Slam (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The silverwind nargacuga uses its tail slam.

reaction.name: Prowler Stance
entries: When hit by a spell or weapon attack, the silverwind nargacuga can leap up to 25 feet in any direction without provoking an attack of opportunity.

The {@creature Nargacuga|MHMM} is an incredibly powerful and highly adapted monster. There is almost no doubt that Nargacuga is the top predator in its most famed environment the Great Forest and a dangerous force to be reckoned within its other environments like Swamps and Jungles because of its night-time camouflage, coupled with its phenomenal speed.

Silverwind nargacuga have many of the same adaptations as nargacuga, however, there are a few differences between them. The silverwind nargacuga has white hairs and scales though only on portions of its body. Its white hairs and scales are light in weight, allowing it to move freely more easily. Its tail spikes are covered in both and have a unique trait that puts it apart from normal individuals. Silverwind Nargacuga is able to generate blades of air by swinging its cutwings or slamming its tail, attacking prey from a distance. The waves of wind are powerful enough to cut up prey, making a creature bleed, and weakening the foe. This new found trait truly makes silverwind nargacuga a quick killer. Due to the lighter weight of the hairs and scales, it is able to evade and jump much more than a typical nargacuga.

items.name: Silverwind Scale
entries: Terwijl je dit pantser draagt heb je {@sense darkvision} tot 60 voet. Als je al darkvision hebt, wordt het bereik met nog eens 60 voet vergroot.

items.name: Silverwind Blackfur
entries: While you are attuned to this armor, you have proficiency in {@skill Stealth}, if you are already proficient then you gain expertise in Stealth. While in dim light or Darkness, you can take the {@action Hide} action as a Bonus Action.

items.name: Silverwind Razor
entries: {@i Evasion.} Je hebt voordeel op Dexterity saving throws terwijl je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: Silverwind Medulla
entries: While you are attuned to this armor, Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks made to see you have disadvantage and you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide.

items.name: Silverwind Tail
entries: While wearing this armor you are shrouded in shadows causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. If you take damage, the property ceases to function until the start of your next turn. This property is suppressed while you are {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition restrained}, or otherwise unable to move.

items.name: Silverwind Tailspike
entries: {@i Silverwind X.} While wearing this armor, you have advantage on Dexterity saving throws and Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide.

items.name: Silverwind Scale
entries: Je wapen brengt een extra 1d6 schade toe.

items.name: Silverwind Fang
entries: {@i (spellcaster only)} While you are attuned to this weapon, you can use an action to cast the {@spell melf's minute meteors|XGE} spell at 4th level, but the meteors take the form or nargacuga spikes and deal piercing damage instead of fire. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

items.name: Silverwind Razor
entries: Je wapen brengt een extra 1d8 schade toe.

items.name: Silverwind Medulla
entries: While you hold your weapon, you gain +2 bonus to spell attack rolls and you ignore half cover when making a spell attack.

items.name: Silverwind Tail
entries: {@i Critical Eye+.} Het bereik van de critical hit van je wapenaanvallen wordt met 2 verhoogd.

items.name: Silverwind Tailspike
entries: {@i Critical Boost.} You roll one additional weapon damage die when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a weapon attack.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the slagtoth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a body slam attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the slagtoth can make one headbutt attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Headbutt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} om te raken, reikwijdte 5 ft., één doel. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) knuppelschade.

action.name: Body Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} om te raken, reikwijdte 5 ft., één doel. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) knuppelschade.

Slagtoth have green, saggy hides covering most of their body, most notably drooping near the sides of the head and along their flanks. They are extremely territorial; the males will attack both Adventurers and creatures. They attack Hunters by ramming with the bone lump on their snouts and body-slamming. When unprovoked however, these docile creatures have often been observed to rest in the waters probably because their floppy, frog-like hides require moisture.

items.name: Slagtoth Hide
entries: Je vermindert koude schade die je oploopt met 2 terwijl je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: Raw Meat
entries: Voor 2 dagen rantsoen indien gekookt.

items.name: Jumbo Bone
entries: Uncommon armor upgrade materiaal.

items.name: Slagtoth Oil
entries: Oil extracted from a Slagtoth's skin. The oil can coat one bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing weapon or up to 5 pieces of slashing or piercing Ammunition. Applying the oil takes 1 minute. For 1 hour, the coated item is magical and deals an extra 1d4 cold damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The sleeptoad explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} until the end of their next turn, the sleeper takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The sleeptoad's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} om te raken, reikwijdte 5 ft., één doelwit. {@h}1 doorborende schade.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: De helmkrab kan lucht en water inademen.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} om te raken, reikwijdte 5 ft., één doelwit. {@h}1 knuppelschade.

A solider helmcrab typically lives near swamp-like areas. They are often sought after by bowgun users, for a solider helmcrab eat {@table plants|AGMH|scatternuts} which can often be found intact inside their stomach.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The somnacanth can hold its breath for 12 hours.

trait.name: Rude Awakening
entries: When a creature is {@condition unconscious}, the somnacanth can use its deadly leap centered on that creature as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shallow Swimmer
entries: The somnacanth can swim in water that is 3 feet deep or deeper.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The somnacanth's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, without a running start. In addition, the somnacanth does not incur attacks of opportunity while moving with a jump.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The somnacanth makes two attacks with its claws or five attacks with its frill quill.

action.name: Headbutt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., two targets. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Frill Quill
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the somnacanth jumps at least 10 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 22 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the somnacanth's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the somnacanth's space.

action.name: Sleep Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The somnacanth exhales a knockout gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, be {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it instead falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, until the sleeper takes damage, or until someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The somnacanth moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If its sleep breath is recharged, it can place a cloud of knockout gas in each space it moves through and its sleep breath cannot be used until it recharges once more.

The knockout gas remains in the spaces for 1 round before dispersing. A creature that starts its turn or enters the space filled with knockout gas must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, until the sleeper takes damage, or until someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake.

legendary.name: Break Shell
entries: The somnacanth breaks a shell it is carrying on its belly. Consult the table below to determine what happens.

legendary.name: Find Shell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The somnacanth finds a random shell. Roll a d3 and consult the table below.

rows: Each creature in a 15-foot radius around the somnacanth must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Each creature in a 60-foot cone in front of the somnacanth must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the blindness on a success.
The somnacanth and each creature within 5 feet of it regains 21 ({@damage 6d6}) hit points.

legendary.name: Siren Song (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: When its sleep breath is recharged, the somnacanth can use this legendary action to extend its body high into the air. It then begins singing a soothing song. On initiative 20 or after three turns (Whichever takes longer), the somnacanth releases knockout gas that spreads out in a 60-foot radius around it. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, until the sleeper takes damage, or until someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake. When this legendary action is used, the somnacanth can't use its sleep breath until it recharges again.

The somnacanth is a leviathan with a very unique physiology. Covering its body are large yellowish scales, transitioning to white on the underside. Its front feet have three digits, each one ending in a long, curved black claw. Its back feet have four digits that end in shorter claws. It has a short face with a disturbingly humanoid appearance. Above its eyes are a pair of large purple horns, with a pair of smaller knob-like protrusions in front of them. Adorning the side of its head are three pairs of small purple fins, with a massive crest-like fin on the top. These purple fins also appear along the top of its tail and form a crescent shape at the tip. It has a hard pad on its belly with a taiko drum-like pattern that it uses to crack open shells.

The somnacanth is capable of producing a sleep-inducing powder in its throat and spraying it through the mouth. Similar to other monsters that can put creatures to sleep, it will use this opportunity to strike at its prey or adversary. It can breathe this powder out as a long ranged, sweeping cone or as a large cloud that covers the whole area. It is capable of jumping high into the air and slamming down on its target.

items.name: Somnacanth Scale
entries: When you are outdoors, harmless creatures such as squirrels and birds flock to you when you sing songs for a minute or longer. If you sing for over 2 minutes, the creatures fall asleep and remain asleep until you stop singing.

items.name: Somnacanth Shell
entries: Terwijl je dit pantser draagt negeer je moeilijk begaanbaar terrein door modderig terrein, moerassen, of andere waterbronnen die taille diep zijn.

items.name: Somnacanth Fin
entries: {@i Item Prolonger+.} Telkens wanneer je een verbruiksartikel met een duur gebruikt, wordt de duur ervan met nog eens 12 seconden verlengd.

items.name: Somnacanth Dust
entries: {@i Divine Blessing+.} When you take damage you are not immune or resistant to, roll a d6 and reduce the damage you take by the number rolled. You can use this property a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

items.name: Somnacanth Talon
entries: Je hebt weerstand tegen koude schade terwijl je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: Somnacanth Gem
entries: While you are attuned to this armor you can speak its command word as an action to cause water to pour onto the ground from it filling the space in a 15-foot radius around you for 1 minute. The area moves with you and is difficult terrain for any creature, other than you, that doesn't have an innate swim speed. Speaking the command word again causes the water to stop flowing from you. You can use this property a number of times equal to half of your proficiency bonus (rounded down), regaining expended uses when you finish a long rest.

items.name: Somnacanth Shell
entries: {@i (Bow only)} You can use the {@item sleep coating|AGMH} with a {@item bow (r)|AGMH|rare bow}, but your coating save DC for it is reduced by 2.

items.name: Somnacanth Fin
entries: {@i Capture Expert.} While attuned to this weapon {@item tranq bomb|AGMH}s and {@item tranq ammo (1)|AGMH|tranq ammo} roll an extra 3d8 when they hit a creature.

items.name: Somnacanth Dust
entries: {@i (Sorcerer & Wizard only) Mini-Bombardier.} Dit wapen heeft 5 runen. Terwijl je het vasthoudt, kun je een actie gebruiken om 1 of meer van de runen te gebruiken om er een van de volgende spreuken mee uit te spreken, met gebruik van je spell save DC: {@spell burning hands} (1 rune) {@spell scorching ray} (2 runes), {@spell aganazzar's scorcher|XGE} (2 runes), of {@spell flaming sphere} (2 runes). Dit wapen krijgt dagelijks bij dageraad 1d4 + 1 verbruikte runen terug. Als je de laatste rune verbruikt, kan het een week lang geen runen meer verkrijgen.

items.name: Somnacanth Talon
entries: Uw koude spreuk geeft een extra 1d6 koude schade.

items.name: Somnacanth Gem
entries: {@i Status Crit (Incapacitate).} Whenever you critically hit with this weapon, the target creature must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save the target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Lg Monster Bone
entries: Zeer zeldzaam materiaal om het pantser te verbeteren.

monster.name: Tempered Alatreon

trait.name: Active State (Mythic Trait)
entries: The alatreon has three states it can take. They are the dragon state, fire state, and the ice state. Each state provides benefits and detriments depending on which state it is in, as shown below:

items.name: Fire State
entries: While in the fire state, the alatreon is immune to fire damage, but vulnerable to cold damage.

items.name: Dragon State
entries: While in the dragon state, the alatreon is resistant to all damage except for necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.

items.name: Ice State
entries: While in the ice state, the alatreon is immune to cold damage, but vulnerable to fire damage.

The alatreon begins combat in either the fire state or ice state. When it begins combat in the fire state, the order of the states it changes into is: fire, dragon, ice, dragon and then repeats. When it starts in the ice stage, the order is: ice, dragon, fire, dragon and then repeats.

Whenever the alatreon hit points are reduced by 100 in its current active state it changes its state to the next one in the order and uses a special reaction to use its element burst. This special reaction can be used even if the alatreon has already used its reaction this round.

trait.name: Elemental Overload
entries: The alatreon gains 1 charge for every 10 elemental damage (fire, cold, lightning) it takes from a single attack or spell. The charges reset to 0 after the alatreon uses its escaton judgement.

trait.name: Horns
entries: the alatreon has two horns, each which can be attacked and broken (AC 30; 200 hit points; resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, slashing damage that do not deal siege damage; immunity to poison, psychic, and the damage immunity alatreon gains from its current active state). Dealing damage to the horn deals no damage to the alatreon. When a horn is broken the alatreon reverts back to its previous active state.

trait.name: Legendary Limit
entries: The alatreon can only use each legendary action once per round.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Als de alatreon faalt bij een reddingsworp, kan hij kiezen om te slagen.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The alatreon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The alatreon's weapon attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The alatreon makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its bite or tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and the target must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw or be afflicted with {@condition dragonblight|MHMM} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the dragonblight on itself on a success.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and the target must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw or be afflicted with {@condition dragonblight|MHMM} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the dragonblight on itself on a success.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target must make a {@dc 27} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Elemental Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Roll a d4 each time you use this action to determine what element the alatreon exhales. On a 1, fire damage; On a 2, cold damage; On a 3, necrotic; On a 4, lightning. The alatreon exhales the rolled element in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 63 ({@damage 18d6}) (of the rolled elemental) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Escaton Judgement (Once during the second dragon state, each time the active state order repeats)
entries: The alatreon swoops down from the sky (without provoking opportunity attacks) if it is not already on the ground and begins gathering energy until the start of its next turn. While charging the alatreon is immune to the {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition stunned}, {@condition paralyzed}, and {@condition unconscious} conditions.

On its next turn, the alatreon can use its action to release the energy it has gathered in a 600-foot-radius-sphere around it. All terrain above ground level in that area is obliterated and each creature in that area must make a {@dc 30} Dexterity saving throw or take 210 ({@damage 60d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The number of damage dice this action deals can be reduced by 10d6 for each horn broken and by an additional #d6 where # is equal to the number of charges its elemental overload has.

legendary.name: Fly
entries: The alatreon flies up to half its fly speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The alatreon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Water Breath
entries: The alatreon fires 5 water globules, each at a different point within a 150-foot cone in front of it. Each creature within a 5-foot radius of a point must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage and be afflicted with {@condition waterblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not afflicted with waterblight on a successful one.

A creature in the area of more than one globule, makes their saving throw at disadvantage, but does not take any additional damage. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the waterblight on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Arc Lightning
entries: The alatreon magically causes lightning to strike, within 120 feet of it, along a 45-foot long line, that is 5 feet wide. It then causes lightning to strike along another 45-foot long, 5-foot-wide line, but this line must begin in a 5-foot space of the original lightning strikes or pass through it at one point in the line. Each creature in a line, must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 5d8}) lightning damage and be afflicted with {@condition thunderblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not afflicted with thunderblight on a successful one.

A creature in the area of more than one line, makes their saving throw at disadvantage, but does not take any additional damage. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the thunderblight on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm
entries: Numerous bolts of lightning strike the ground in a 120-foot radius around the alatreon. Choose three creatures, each of which must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage and be afflicted with {@condition thunderblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not afflicted with thunderblight on a successful one. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the thunderblight on itself on a success.

mythicHeader: The alatreon can use the options below as legendary actions depending on which state it is currently in, as determined by its mythic trait:

mythic.name: Dragon State
entries: The alatreon can use the following legendary actions while in the dragon state.

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The alatreon uses its multiattack.

items.name: Dragon Rush
entries: The alatreon moves up to half its fly speed in a straight line, during this move it may move through other creatures without provoking attacks of opportunity. Each creature or object the alatreon moves through must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage and be knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked prone on a successful one.

mythic.name: Fire State
entries: The alatreon can use the following legendary actions while in the fire state.

items.name: Fireball
entries: The alatreon exhales a fireball to a point within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 15-foot radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Fire Breath Y
entries: The alatreon exhales fire in a 45-foot line that is 5 feet wide and then splits into a two more lines forming a "Y" shape that are 30 feet long and wide 5 feet. Each creature in a line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Scorched Earth
entries: The alatreon rises 30 feet into the air, without provoking opportunity attacks, and exhales flames that covers the ground in a 30-foot radius centered on a point directly below it. The ground continues to burn until the start of the alatreon's next turn. Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that starts its turn in the area or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage and ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the burning creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage for every 5 feet it travels.

mythic.name: Ice State
entries: The alatreon can use the following legendary actions while in the ice state.

items.name: Frost Breath
entries: The alatreon rises 30 feet into the air, without provoking opportunity attacks, and exhales frost that covers the ground in a 30-foot radius centered on a point directly below it. The frost remains until the start of the alatreon's next turn and Each creature that starts its turn in that area must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage and be afflicted with {@condition iceblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not afflicted with iceblight on a successful one. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage for every 5 feet it travels.

items.name: Ice Shards
entries: The alatreon freezes the air around it creating ice shards that fill a 5-foot-cube in the air above each creature in a 90-foot radius around it, before they plummet to the ground. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save the creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) cold damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage, is pushed 5 feet into an unoccupied space, and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, is pushed 5 feet into an unoccupied space, but isn't knocked prone. If there are no unoccupied spaces around the creature, it fails its saving throw and is knocked prone under the ice chunk until it melts, is destroyed, or it succeeds on a {@dc 20} {@skill Athletics} check.

The ice shards remain in the spaces they land in until they melt at the start of the alatreon's next turn. The ice shards can be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 10 hit points; vulnerable to fire damage; immune to cold, poison, and psychic damage). If the ice shard takes necrotic damage, it instead explodes in a 15-foot radius dealing 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage to each creature in that area.

reaction.name: Element Burst
entries: When the alatreon changes active states it can use this special reaction to release elemental energy into the area around it. Each creature in a 30-foot radius-sphere around the alatreon must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The damage type is determined by the active state the alatreon changes into: fire damage for fire state, necrotic damage for dragon state, and cold damage for ice state.

Within the New World, the {@creature alatreon|MHMM} has taken on a unique form of water element alongside its four existing elements. The alatreon is also capable of creating unique ice structures that explode when struck. Finally, alatreon's mastery over the elements has been enhanced beyond what was previously known, allowing the alatreon to take on unique active forms based on three core elements; fire state, ice state and dragon state. When transitioning between its dragon state and either fire or ice state, alatreon will generate an immense pool of elemental energy, eventually allowing it to execute a devastating burst of elements known as the Escaton Judgment, decimating any who are unfortunate enough to be within the vicinity of this tremendous power.

items.name: Alatreon Mantle
entries: {@i Blightproof.} Als je dit pantser draagt, ben je immuun voor vloekspreuken, vloekachtige vaardigheden en condities.

items.name: Alatreon Riptalon
entries: {@i Evasion+.} Je krijgt een +1 bonus op alle saving throws en je hebt voordeel op Dexterity saving throws terwijl je dit pantser draagt.

items.name: Alatreon Pallium
entries: While wearing this armor you can use an action to cast the {@spell control weather} spell from it. Once used, you can't use this property again for 1 week.

items.name: Alatreon Diretail
entries: {@i Iron Wall+.} Je hebt een +3 bonus aan je armor klasse terwijl je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: Alatreon Direwing
entries: {@i Health Boost+2.} While wearing this armor, your hit point maximum increases by 3 for each character level you have.

items.name: Skyswayer
entries: Als je dit harnas draagt, heb je voordeel bij het opslaan van worpen tegen spreuken en andere magische effecten.

items.name: Azure Dragonsphire
entries: You are immune to force damage and resistant to necrotic damage while you wear this armor.

items.name: Alatreon Mantle
entries: {@i Critical Element.} When you critically hit with a weapon or spell that deals cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, or thunder damage, you deal an extra {@damage 1d10} damage of that type.

items.name: Alatreon Riptalon
entries: {@i Resentment.} Until the end of your turn, you gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls against any creature that has damaged you since the end of your last turn.

items.name: Alatreon Pallium
entries: {@i Critical Eye+2.} Het bereik van de critical hit van je wapenaanvallen wordt vergroot met 3.

items.name: Alatreon Diretail
entries: While you are attuned to this weapon, your cold, fire, and lightning spells bypass a creatures resistance and immunities.

items.name: Alatreon Direwing
entries: Your weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d12} damage. This damage can be cold, fire, lightning, or necrotic damage (your choice).

items.name: Skyswayer
entries: {@i Critical Status (Blight).} When you make a weapon attack with this weapon, and roll a 20 for the attack roll, the target is afflicted with {@condition dragonblight|MHMM}, {@condition iceblight|MHMM}, {@condition thunderblight|MHMM}, or {@condition waterblight|MHMM} (your choice) until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Azure Dragongem
entries: {@i Power Prolonger.} Afhankelijk van in welk wapen dit materiaal wordt geplaatst, krijgt het de volgende voordelen:

items.name: Dual Blades
entries: De duur van de Demon/Archdemon modus is met 30 seconden verlengd.

items.name: Great Sword
entries: Guard geeft een +4 AC bonus voor de duur van de beurt dat het gebruikt wordt.

items.name: Hunting Horn
entries: De duur van de melodieën wordt met 1 minuut verlengd.

items.name: Insect Glaive
entries: Kinsects Essence duur is verhoogd met 1 minuut.

items.name: Lance
entries: De Powerguard geeft een AC bonus van +4 voor de duur van de beurt dat hij gebruikt wordt.

items.name: Switch Axe
entries: De duur van het Mantelwapen wordt met 1 minuut verlengd.

items.name: Tonfas
entries: Aardse stijl. Wapen schade wordt verhoogd naar een d10.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: Elke zeldzaamheid wapen upgrade materiaal.

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: Elke zeldzaamheid armor upgrade materiaal.

entries.name: Alatreon Material Bonus
entries: Wanneer een karakter twee volwassen alatreon materialen in zijn uitrusting heeft, krijgt hij de bonus {@i Alatreon Divinity}. Wanneer hij drie getemperde alatreon materialen in zijn uitrusting heeft, krijgt hij de bonus {@i Alatreon Divinity+}.
{@b Alatreon Divinity.} Als je koude, vuur of bliksemschade toebrengt, wordt de dobbelsteen met 1 maat verhoogd.
{@b Alatreon Divinity+.} Je krijgt de voordelen van de eerste {@i alatreon divinity} en je hebt weerstand tegen koude-, vuur-, en bliksemschade.

trait.name: Blinding Panic
entries: When the chameloes is {@condition invisible} and is {@condition blinded} by a {@item flash bomb|AGMH} or other effect, it panics and loses concentration. While the chameloes is blinded, it is unable to use its Invisible Passage.

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The chameleos has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to {@action hide}.

trait.name: Deadly Poison
entries: Poison damage dealt by the chameleos, including poison damage a creature takes at the start of its turn from the {@condition poisoned} condition, bypasses a creature's resistance to poison damage and deals half damage to creatures that are immune to poison damage.

trait.name: Elder Dragon Sight
entries: Magical Darkness doesn't impede the chameleos's darkvision.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: The chameleos can innately cast the {@spell fog cloud} spell at 3rd-level at will. It doesn't need to concentrate on the spell, but when recast, the previous fog cloud dissipates.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Als de kameleos niet slaagt, kan hij kiezen om te slagen.

trait.name: Silent Step
entries: Terwijl {@condition invisible}, als een bonus actie, teleporteert de kameleos tot 30 voet naar een onbezette ruimte.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chameleos makes two attacks with its horn or two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and the target and each Medium or smaller creature adjacent to the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw, or be pushed 10 feet away from the chameleos and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. On hit, if the target has an object in at least one hand, they must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or have the object swallowed by the Chameleos. If the chameleos takes 30 damage in one turn, it regurgitates all swallowed objects in an 5 foot area adjacent to it.

action.name: Poison Fountain (Must be in fog)
entries: The chameleos looks up and exhales three poison balls into the air, each of which can strike a target within the fog cloud. A target must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. While poisoned in this way, the creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature may repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the poison on a success.

action.name: Poison Ring {@recharge 5}
entries: The chameleos flies 15 feet into the air without provoking opportunity attacks and exhales poisonous gas that spreads across the ground in a 30-foot radius centered directly below the chameleos. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't poisoned on a successful one. While poisoned in this way, the creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature may repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the poison on a success.

action.name: Invisible Passage
entries: De kameleos draait magisch {@condition invisible} totdat hij aanvalt of een spreuk uitspreekt, of totdat zijn concentratie ophoudt (alsof hij zich op een spreuk concentreert). Terwijl hij {@condition invisible} draait, laat de kameleos geen fysiek bewijs achter, zodat hij alleen door magie gevolgd kan worden.

legendary.name: Attack (2/round)
entries: The chameleos attacks with its tongue or tail.

legendary.name: Transparent
entries: The chameleos uses its invisible passage.

legendary.name: Mist (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The chameleos casts the {@spell fog cloud} spell at 3rd-level.

legendary.name: Poison Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The chameleos exhales poisonous gas in a 90-foot line that is 5-feet wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't poisoned on a successful one. While poisoned in this way, the creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature may repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the poison on a success.

Het lichaam van de kameleon is bedekt met een paars-witte huid, en zijn kop eindigt met een vooruitstekende hoorn op het puntje van zijn neus. Zijn ogen zijn vergelijkbaar met die van een echte kameleon; groot en bolvormig, met de mogelijkheid om de oogbewegingen individueel te regelen. Met zijn lange, elastische tong kan hij voorwerpen van op een afstand vastgrijpen en stelen. Zijn vleugels hebben een paarse kleur met een grijswit membraan, en worden gebruikt om te vliegen en de richting van zijn gifnevel te regelen. De grote staart van Chameleos doet denken aan een blad en heeft een gekrulde, spiraalvormige punt.

Kameleo's zijn anders dan andere Ouderdomsdraken, omdat ze lang niet zo "elegant" zijn in hun verschijning als andere Ouderdomsdrakensoorten. Kameleos hebben een aantal biologische aanpassingen die hen zeer uniek maken. Het meest opvallend is het camouflage mechanisme van de kameleos. Elke kameleosoort heeft een andere manier om zich te camoufleren. Door een zwakke elektrische stroom in zijn huid op te wekken die in wisselwerking staat met de mist die hij kan inademen, kan de Elder Dragon het licht om zich heen buigen, waardoor hij in feite onzichtbaar wordt. Sommige kameleo's gebruiken speciaal erts om hun camouflage mogelijk te maken. Kameleos hebben onafhankelijk bewegende oogballen die aan de zijkanten van hun kop uitsteken om een breder gezichtsveld te creëren. Kameleos hebben verschillende nare verdedigingsmechanismen voor het geval ze ooit worden aangevallen. Zij bezitten een zeer sterk gif, dat naar believen uit hun bek kan worden vrijgelaten en vaak door de vleugels van de draak tot een dikke wolk wordt opgezweept. Sommige Kameleos bezitten ook een extra stembandverlammend gif in hun zure klodders. Ten slotte kan hij grote hoeveelheden mist uitademen om het zicht van jagers nog verder te belemmeren, zodat hij ofwel snel weg kan komen of met gemak een verrassingsaanval kan uitvoeren.

Kameleo's zijn hinderlaagjagers, geduldig wachtend tot een prooi voorbij komt, terwijl ze zich perfect in hun omgeving integreren. Chameleos kunnen en zullen bijna alles eten, en kunnen verschillende tactieken gebruiken om prooien van verschillende grootte te verslaan. Is zijn prooi een Neopteron, zoals een {@creature Vespoid|MHMM}, {@creature Altaroth|MHMM}, {@creature Bnahabra|MHMM} of {@creature Konchu|MHMM}, dan grijpt hij die gewoon uit de lucht met zijn lange kleverige tong. Als het een bevoorradingskamp is, zal het stelen bij elke kans die het krijgt.

Kameleons zijn zeer intelligente wezens. Ze wachten geduldig op een belangrijke plaats, zoals een waterbron of een natuurlijk kruispunt, tot er een prooi voorbij komt. Kameleos staan bekend om het stelen van voorwerpen van avonturiers. Kameleos doen dit zodat de avonturiers hun motivatie verliezen om op hen te jagen.

items.name: T.Chameleos Speckled Hide
entries: While wearing this armor all creatures have disadvantage on skills checks when trying to track you. Additionally you leave no footprints while you are {@condition invisible}.

items.name: T.Chameleos Wing
entries: Je hebt voordeel op Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) controles terwijl je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: T.Chameleos Claw
entries: {@i Evade Window.} Dit pantser heeft 3 runen, en het krijgt dagelijks bij dageraad 1d3 uitgeputte runen terug. Als je niet slaagt voor een Dexterity saving throw terwijl je het draagt, kun je je reactie gebruiken om 1 van de runen te gebruiken om in plaats daarvan te slagen voor die saving throw.

items.name: TC.Deadly Poison Sac
entries: {@i Rock Steady.} Als je dit pantser draagt, kun je niet ongewild worden geslagen {@condition prone} en negeer je effecten zoals de kushala daora en de amatsu's windbarrière.

items.name: T.Chameleos Tail
entries: Je bent immuun voor koude schade als je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: T.Chameleos Spike
entries: While you are wearing this armor and you take damage, you can use your reaction to magically turn {@condition invisible} until the start of your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw. You can use this property twice, regaining all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

items.name: T.Chameleos Gem
entries: You are resistant to poison damage and immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition while you wear this armor.

items.name: T.Chameleos Speckled Hide
entries: This weapon is transparent while sheathed or stowed on your body. If a creature uses its action to examine you, the creature can see the slight shimmer of the weapon with a successful {@dc 20} Wisdom ({@skill Perception}).

items.name: T.Chameleos Wing
entries: {@i Peak Performance.} Als je hit points vol zijn en je gooit een 1 of een 2 op een dobbelsteen voor een aanval die je doet met een mêlee-wapen, kun je de dobbelsteen opnieuw gooien en moet je de nieuwe worp gebruiken, zelfs als de nieuwe worp een 1 of een 2 is.

items.name: T.Chameleos Claw
entries: {@i (Ranged weapon only) Deadeye+.} Het normale aanvalsbereik van je wapen wordt verdubbeld.

items.name: TC.Deadly Poison Sac
entries: {@i (Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock & Wizard only)} Dit wapen heeft 10 runen Terwijl je dit wapen vasthoudt, kan je een actie gebruiken om 1 of meer van zijn runen te gebruiken om er een van de volgende Spreuken mee uit te spreken, met gebruik van je spell save DC: {@spell dragon's breath|XGE} (vergif) (1 rune), {@spell fog cloud} (1 rune), {@spell darkvision} (2 runes), {@spell invisibility} (2 runes) of, {@spell stinking cloud} (3 rune). Het wapen krijgt dagelijks bij dageraad 1d4 + 1 verbruikte runen terug. Als je de laatste rune verbruikt, kan het een week lang geen runen herwinnen.

items.name: T.Chameleos Tail
entries: You gain a + 2 bonus to your spell attack rolls and spell save DC while attuned to this weapon. This bonus increases to +4 when the spell you are casting deals poison damage.

items.name: T.Chameleos Spike
entries: {@i Status Crit (Poison).} Whenever you critically hit with this weapon, the target creature must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save the target is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

items.name: T.Chameleos Gem
entries: {@i Mind's Eye.} Je aanvallen met dit wapen omzeilen de schadeweerstand van elk wezen.

items.name: TC.Deadly Poison Sac
entries: Je kunt een {@dc 17} Wisdom ({@item Poisoner's Kit|PHB}) check doen met dit materiaal als ingrediënt plus een {@item vial|PHB}. Als je slaagt maak je een flesje van {@item midnight tears|DMG} (DMG p. 258). Als je faalt, wordt het materiaal vernietigd.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: Elke zeldzaamheid wapen upgrade materiaal.

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: Elke zeldzaamheid armor upgrade materiaal.

entries.name: A Chameleos's Lair
entries: De Bosbewonende Kameleos deelt zelden zijn territorium met andere draken. Met zijn vermogen om naar believen onzichtbaar te worden, steelt hij de schatten van alles wat probeert binnen te dringen en over te nemen. Het hol van een kameleos wordt soms verward met het hol van een groene draak omdat er in beide een eeuwige mist hangt, waarbij de kameleos een zoetere zweem van zijn gifmist meedraagt. Kleine paddestoelen, bekend als paddenstoelen, strooien over de grond en laten giftige sporen los bij de geringste aanraking. Ze worden groter naarmate je dieper in het bos komt.

In het midden van het woud kiezen de kameleos een bosje dat meestal bedekt is met paddestoelen. De bomen in het bos zijn schaars, zodat de kameleos vrij in en uit kan bewegen. In het midden is een kuil gegraven die gevuld is met de schatten die de kameleos heeft verzameld van verloren volkeren, avonturiers en alles wat hij op zijn reizen heeft gestolen.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: Als de dire miralis een reddingsworp niet haalt, kan hij kiezen om te slagen.

trait.name: Magma Armor
entries: When the dire miralis is below half of its maximum hp, its body cools and AC increases by +5.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: De dire miralis brengt dubbele schade toe aan voorwerpen en structuren.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: De dire miralis doet twee klauw aanvallen. Of hij doet twee magma glob aanvallen.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Magma Glob
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage and the space it is in, is covered in lava for 24 hours before cooling. On a miss, an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target is covered in lava. The lava ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried and creature that starts its turn in the lava or enters the space for the first time on a turn, takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Crush
entries: The dire miralis slams its body on the ground in a 40-foot square in front of it. Each creature in that areas must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage and 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the dire miralis's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is with in range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the dire miralis's space.

action.name: Greater Fireball {@recharge 5}
entries: The dire miralis exhales a massive fireball within 150 feet of its location. Each creature in a 25-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Move
entries: De dire miralis beweegt tot zijn snelheid zonder gelegenheidsaanvallen uit te lokken.

legendary.name: Tremor
entries: The dire miralis stomps on the ground sending a tremor out in a 60-foot radius around it. Each creature other than the dire miralis on the ground in that area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Magma Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: De dire miralis doet een magma bol aanval.

Dire Miralis is een zeer grote, semi-aquatische Ouderdraak. Zijn lichaamsbouw doet denken aan {@creature Fatalis|MHMM}, met relatief korte ledematen en een lange staart en nek. Zijn lichaam is gevuld met een magma-achtige substantie die zich verzamelt aan de basis van de staart, de borst, en bij elke schouder. Elk van deze poelen leidt de magmastroom naar bepaalde delen van het lichaam. Op zijn rug zitten een paar vleugelachtige aanhangsels. Schijnbaar nutteloos om mee te vliegen, zijn deze "vleugels" voorzien van kanonachtige goten die bolletjes magma kunnen uitstoten, zowel als verdedigingsmiddel als om overtollig magma af te werpen. Het hoofd van de Dire Miralis heeft een kraagachtige structuur en een opstaande snuit.

Door de hete vloeistoffen binnenin de Dire Miralis, komt er een intense hitte uit zijn lichaam, die alle waterbronnen in zijn omgeving doet koken. Deze intense hitte kan gemakkelijk alle levende wezens binnen het bereik van de Dire Miralis wegvagen.

Interessant is dat lang nadat een Dire Miralis sterft, zijn hart blijft kloppen, zelfs als het wordt verwijderd - precies zoals de legende zegt. Er wordt gezegd dat de Dire Miralis zijn hele lichaam kan regenereren met zijn hart alleen, en dat de Dire Miralis zelfs onsterfelijk is.

Dire Miralis is uiterst vijandig tegenover alle levende wezens en kan een heel ecosysteem vernietigen, alleen al door zijn intense hitte. Een Dire Miralis heeft in de oudheid zelfs de Vervuilde Zee vernietigd en alle levende wezens in het gebied gedood, waarbij het water met bloed werd gevuld, totdat hij werd verdreven. Dit monster is er een waar veel jagers niets meer over kunnen vertellen.

items.name: T.Miralis Scale
entries: {@i Current Resist.} Terwijl je dit pantser draagt, heb je geen invloed op de stroming van het water, natuurlijk of magisch, tenzij je er anders voor kiest.

items.name: T.Miralis Fireback
entries: {@i Windproof.} Spreuken die je uitspreekt, zoals {@spell fog cloud}, kunnen niet langer worden verspreid door de wind, magisch of anderszins, terwijl je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: T.Gushing Magma
entries: {@i HG Earplugs.} Terwijl je op dit pantser bent afgestemd, kun je een bonusactie gebruiken om twee oordoppen in de vorm van je keuze te toveren. Terwijl je deze oordopjes gebruikt, kun je alleen wezens horen die je zelf kiest te kunnen horen en je hebt voordeel op saving throws tegen donderschade.

items.name: T.Immortal Heart
entries: When you are below half of your maximum hit points, you can use your bonus action to increase your AC by 3 for 1 minute. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

items.name: T.Miralis Hellwing
entries: Je bent immuun voor vuurschade als je dit harnas draagt.

items.name: T.Miralis Evil Eye
entries: {@i Rock Steady.} Als je dit pantser draagt, kun je niet ongewild worden geslagen {@condition prone} en negeer je effecten zoals de kushala daora en de amatsu's windbarrière.

items.name: T.Miralis Scale
entries: Je wapen brengt een extra 1d8 schade toe.

items.name: T.Miralis Fireclaw
entries: Je wapen geeft een extra 1d8 vuur schade.

items.name: T.Immortal Heart
entries: Whenever you cast a spell of 1st-level or higher, lava erupts from the ground around you. any creature within 5 feet of you takes {@damage 2d8} points of fire damage. Also when you cast a spell that deals fire damage, it deals extra damage equal to 2 times the spells level as fire damage.

items.name: T.Miralis Smelter
entries: This weapon has 4 runes that it regains daily at dawn. When you hit a creature with this weapon, you can expend a rune to have it make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.

items.name: T.Miralis Hellwing
entries: {@i (Spellcaster only)} This weapon has 7 runes. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its runes to cast the {@spell fireball} spell (save {@dc 16}) from it. For 1 rune, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional rune you expend.

Dit wapen krijgt dagelijks bij dageraad 1d6 + 1 verbruikte runen terug. Als je de laatste rune van het wapen hebt verbruikt, gooi dan een d20. Bij een 1 kunnen de runen een week lang niet herladen worden.
